title: List of all Android nfc reader  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android nfc reader  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: nfc-card-reader
repoList.description: An Android Library to read card data from NFC enabled cards

repoList.name: LibraryNFC
repoList.description: MIFARE DESFire NFC Reader and HCE Emulator apps for Android

repoList.name: NFCV-reader
repoList.description: Android app to demo Google speech & fetching library catalogue information from FINNA API

repoList.name: PaymentCardReaderDemo
repoList.description: Ultrasimplified android payment card reader using this library https://github.com/devnied/EMV-NFC-Paycard-Enrollment

repoList.name: BluetoothReader
repoList.description: A nifty (Android) library for capturing, verifying and authenticating fingerprint on the Huifan-7000 Bluetooth Reader. It can also be used to read NFC Cards on said device

repoList.name: devtools-fp07
repoList.description: Android library for working with near field communication (nfc), fingerprint reader and more on the fp07 device.

repoList.name: ACS_Reader_Test-Updated
repoList.description: This is a library to use ACS readers with an android device to have the same NFC capabilities an inbuilt readers. It also supports control codes  to send commands to readers without a tag placed on the reader. I hope to make it an API like library to use across the board for all android devices.
